invitationInfo: WE INVITE YOU TO CELEBRATE OUR WEDDING
contactUs: Please, contact us with information about your decision!
acceptInfo: Would you like to share this moment with us?
name: Name
giftsInfo: Don't rack your brains over gifts! Instead of flowers, give us cat food for the shelter or a bottle of wine. If you prefer to leave all the hardships of choosing to us, then just give money.
dressCodeInfo: Our celebration will be held in a party format, so we do not limit the looks of the guests in any way.
messageSuccess: Your message has been sent successfully!
messageFailure: Your message was not sent due to an error!
deadlineInfo: It is important for us that you give us an answer before
